publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4590 Jackie Baillie: Club of Championsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Helensburgh Sailing Club on the opening of its new clubhouse; notes that the club can claim Olympic gold medalist Mike McIntyre, round the world yachtswoman Emma Richards and Stephen Park OBE as former members; understands that the opening is a culmination of years of fundraising by club members, and wishes the club every success with its new facilities that will undoubtedly give rise to a new generation of Scottish champions.
S3M-4590 Club of Champions (lodged on 10 July 2009) Kenneth Gibson*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-4590 Club of Champions (lodged on 10 July 2009) Robin Harper*
